i want to Create Win Application using WPF , the app will be used with touch Screens , so it will have animation , drag and drop ... 
any suggestion for third party Libraries

مثال على المبالغة الشديدة وتأثير الـ Social Media على الناس ...
اجابة على سؤال سُئل مئات المرات قبل كده ... واتكتب عنه مئات المرات من مدونين ومن Google نفسها ... وبس عشان اللي جاوب بيشتغل في Google ، صفحة Stackoverflow على Facebook نشرت السؤال وكانت النتيجة في خلال ٢٤ ساعة أخد كم رهيب من الـ Upvotes بدون أي داعي ... بدون الإجابة دي السؤال ده كان بعد كام ساعة حيتعمل له Report ويتقفل بسرعة

 واضح كده ان المشكلة مش عندنا احنا بس :D

posts.message: This is an article about a campaign I truly believe in and support to end software patents forever. In reality, I want to abolish the patent system as a whole. Check it out
posts.caption: endsoftpatents.org
posts.description: Each software patent blocks software developers from implementing a feature such as a video format, pinch-to-zoom, or nested menus. For 20 years, no developer can implement that feature without asking the patent holder, who can refuse, or ask for payment and impose conditions. Today there are tens o…

posts.message:
I have started a series of blog posts that is based on Clean Code chapters. I hope it help you as much as the book helps me.
The third blog is here to discuss naming your variables , classes , etc

Feel free to discuss your thoughts in the comments of each post. It would be very useful.
posts.caption: ahmedkamal.me
posts.description: In this series of posts , I would try to share with you some of my highlights on Clean Code Chapters. Names are everywhere in software. We name our variables, our functions, our arguments, classes, and packages.Because we do so...

posts.message:
Hi I have this problem and wish if someone can give me some hints regarding the solution.

I have N data files where each file have 300-400k data points, I need to graph 10 files per html page using Dygraph java script library.

Dygraph is doing an excellent job but this is heavy processing for a web browser. Is there are a way to make the Server do the javascript processing and show the results in the browser, so the browser would be lighter ?

I have googled a lot but it seem no simple solution for this.
